$WmMPID_温泉カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Spa19,Face|Welcome to the women's bath.$k$p$WmMPID_温泉ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_F_Spa19,Face|Wait! We have to fight like this?$k$p$WmMPID_温泉カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Spa19,Face|We don't have much choice. The
contact binds us, and we must
honor it, no matter where we are...$k$pPrincess Hinoka, fight with pride!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_温泉カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Spa19,Face|We were outmaneuvered... Let's
fall back to the other bath and
meet up with Elise.$k$p$WmMPID_温泉ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_F_Spa19,Face|Do we have time to get dressed? No?$k$p$Sbs150|
